config.description: Conector de entrada de dados referente a Agendamento Pedido
config.timestamp.column.name: dataSolicitacao
config.incrementing.column.name: idBoleto
config.query: SELECT * FROM (SELECT be.Id_Boleto AS idBoleto, CAST(be.ValorBoleto AS NUMERIC(15,2)) AS valor, cb.DataProcessamento AS dataAgendamento, be.DataEmissao AS dataSolicitacao FROM arquivocargastd arq (nolock) INNER JOIN CargasMachina cb (nolock) ON cb.ID_ARQUIVOCARGASTD = arq.ID_ARQUIVOCARGASTD INNER JOIN CargaControleFinanceiro cf (nolock) ON cf.Id_CargaControleFinanceiro = cb.Id_CargaControleFinanceiro INNER JOIN BoletosEmitidos be (nolock) on be.Id_Boleto = cf.Id_Boleto WHERE cb.status not in (6) and ARQ.STATUS IN (3,4,5,6) GROUP BY be.Id_Boleto, be.ValorBoleto, cb.DataProcessamento, be.DataEmissao) AS AgendamentoPedido
config.transforms.setSchemaName.schema.name: br.com.Machina.schema.ConnConfirmacaoAgendamentoPedidoValue
